definition: Electronic devices that manage, regulate, or interface with electrical power and device operation

positive_examples: The thermostat controller automatically adjusts the heating system temperature
She plugged the laptop charger into the wall outlet
The power adapter allows European plugs to work in American outlets
The game controller responded perfectly to every button press
I need to find an outlet adapter for my phone charger when traveling
The industrial controller monitors all factory equipment status
negative_examples: The LED light bulb illuminated the entire room brightly
The smartphone's touchscreen displayed vivid colors and sharp text
The microwave heated the food using electromagnetic radiation
The transistor amplified the electrical signal in the circuit
The battery stored electrical energy for later use
The speaker produced clear audio from the amplified signal
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DisplayDevices, AudioElectronics, PowerSupply, ProcessingComponents
